fields.Name: Research Agent - Web Only Question
fields.Description: Tests the Research Agent's ability to answer questions using only web research, without requiring database access. Validates that the Web Research Agent is invoked appropriately and Database Research Agent is not used unnecessarily.

InputDefinition.prompt: What are the latest developments in quantum computing announced in the past month? Please provide a comprehensive overview of recent breakthroughs, companies involved, and potential applications.

oracles.description: Verifies agent execution completed without errors
Validates output matches Research Agent schema (metadata, plan, findings, etc.)
Ensures Web Research Agent is used and Database Research Agent is not invoked

criteria: Response includes recent (last month) developments in quantum computing
Multiple sources or companies are referenced
Response is well-structured with clear findings

oracles.description: LLM evaluates response quality and relevance
